remarks.format: ## Remarks 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 預設值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下列範例中，值，會取得代表目前停駐位置的控制項，以支援。In the following example, a value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports .
